Multiple users on Twitter uploaded the v: 2. An Arabic user shared the video claiming that "RSS terrorists" were killing Muslims.
Twitter users from Pakistan also shared: blaming the Indian government and RSS for the violence.
Alt News performed a keyframe analysis a: finding a BBC Hindi report and a Times of India report that provided context to the video, indicating that it was not related to the Delhi riots but rather to incidents of violence due to child-lifting rumors in Madhya Pradesh.
